Hive Select

Decription

Hive Select is an action that is performed like any other Select statment in a relationional database.

Source

The source type for Hive Select has to be Hive and the sub types Hive Table or Hive Partition. Only one input is needed for Hive Select

Filters - Page 1

The Filters page will allow for organizing by conditions, partitions or grouping.

Condition

Condition is where the condition is set for the query. The attributes can be selected to be included in the query , from there the type of condition ca
